name: The Tower 2 (itch)
description:
Back in 2015, I released a game on Kongregate called "The Tower". It was a short Unity first-person platformer that had you collecting 5 "coins" around a map that was structured like, you guessed it, a tower.

Flash to some years later, and the Unity player that allowed The Tower to be uploaded to Kongregate was dead. Unfortunately, this meant I had lost the original files to play the game, too. The Tower was lost to time.

So, I decided to make it anew -- with a brand new environment, and a lot of extended content. This was mostly an exercise to get some experience in the Unity game engine, but I tried my best to make it a full experience that you should get an hour or so of gameplay out of. Good luck!
